name: barricade test
description:
[a very short Les Misérables exR fangame]

Guide Grantaire through the June Rebellion!  ...At least, the parts he's awake for.

‣ gameplay time: ~3-5 min

‣ tw loud/startling noises and mild depiction of blood (no gore)

Find me on Tumblr!  This is my first time coding, so please let me know what you think ^^
